channel.title: Posts on The Common-EGSE Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The Common-EGSE Documentation

item.title: PDF versions added
item.description: The PDF version of all the manuals have been added to the site. The PDFs are stand-alone documents and are generated from the sane source as the HTML pages. Some of the inter-document links will however not work with these PDFs. The CGSE Installation Manual The CGSE User Manual The CGSE Developer Manual The CGSE Interface Control Document

item.title: Installation Manual updated
item.description: The Installation Manual got a major update. Most of the content from the old website has been transferred and updated, and new content has been added based on experience with installations at IAS. Please note there are still a few sections to fill, that will be done in the coming days. As you know the manuals are generated from a GitHub repository plato-cgse-doc, so if you read something the is incorrect, or if you notice missing content, please open an issue on the repo or create a pull request with the fixed or updated content.

item.title: On Line Documents
item.description: The CGSE documentation has moved and is being updated to include the latest releases for both Common-EGSE and Test Scripts. You can find the following documents already in a draft version. Note The links below will bring you to an external page which has no links back into this area. You might want to open the links in another browser tab. The CGSE Installation Manual The CGSE User Manual
